markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“One meditator is skilled in the supports for immersion but not in the mindfulness meditation subjects for immersion. …”

(These five discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)

SN.34.46–49. Gocaramūlakaabhinīhārasuttādicatukka (“Four on Subjects and Projection, Etc.“)
